list.name: MetaSpeaker
list.content: An advanced speaker that can project audible sources precisely in space, even down to a single point. By using airâ€™s nonlinearity, Meta-Speaker reproduces sound through intersecting ultrasonic beams from two arrays, creating a perceivable source in 3D space.
list.title: Acoustic Source Projection by Exploiting Air Nonlinearity

list.name: MicNest
list.content: An acoustic localization system for precise drone landing. MicNest is able to localize a drone 120 m away with 0.53% relative localization error at 20 Hz location update frequency.
list.title: Acoustic Localization System for Precise Drone Landing

list.name: MotorBeat
list.content: An acoustic communication approach that connects small appliances to the Internet. Our key idea is to exploit direct current (DC) motors, which are common components of small appliances, to transmit acoustic messages to a smart speaker. The communciaiton range is up to 10 m.
list.title: Acoustic Communication System for Small Appliances
